titles.name: Street Explorer
titles.flavorText: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Or in this case, a single tap.

titles.name: Street Master
titles.flavorText: You don't just know the streets; you are the streets.

titles.name: Barcelona Legend
titles.flavorText: They'll build statues of you. Or at least name a small alley after you.

titles.name: Early Supporter
titles.description: Show your support for the game.
titles.flavorText: You were here when we were just a map and a dream. Thank you!

titles.name: Top Contributor
titles.flavorText: Your feedback shapes the city. You are a true architect of Girify.

titles.name: VIP Status
titles.flavorText: Access to absolutely nothing extra, but you look cool doing it.

badges.name: Paellador Connoisseur
badges.description: Authentic cultural experience! Best served with neon yellow rice and frozen peas.

badges.name: Sangria Bucket
badges.description: 1 liter of sugar and cheap wine. A sophisticated choice for a sophisticated traveler.

badges.name: T-Casual Hoarder
badges.description: You know the struggle of the magnetic strip failing at the turnstile.

badges.name: Pigeon Whisperer
badges.description: They are the true owners of the city. You have earned their respect.

badges.name: The Balcony Grandma
badges.description: She sees everything. She judges everything. The ultimate security camera.

badges.name: The Water Gun Avenger
badges.description: For when the terrace noise gets too loud. A playful weapon of distraction.

badges.name: Vermut Sunday
badges.description: The sacred ritual. Must be consumed standing up in a crowded doorway.

badges.name: The Inflation Breakfast
badges.description: It costs 25 Euros, but the sourdough is artisan. You hipster.

badges.name: Rooftop Yoga
badges.description: Namaste on the terrace. Please ignore the construction noise next door.

badges.name: Coworking King
badges.description: You work in 'Tech'. You have calls at 10. You need fast WiFi.

badges.name: Pickpocket Proof
badges.description: Your wallet is safe. Your dignity? Debatable.

badges.name: Electric Scooter Menace
badges.description: Sidewalks, roads, bike lanes... the world is your highway.

badges.name: Yacht Parking Only
badges.description: You don't guess streets anymore; you buy them.
